mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWIDX, USERIDX, RESIDX, REVIEWCONTENT, REVIEWDATE) VALUES ( #{reviewIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{resIdx}, #{reviewContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEWIDX, u.USERIDX, u.USERNAME, re.RESNAME, r.REVIEWCONTENT, r.REVIEWDATE, r.RESIDX FROM REVIEW r JOIN USER u ON r.USERIDX = u.USERIDX JOIN RESTAURANT re ON r.RESIDX = re.RESIDX WHERE r.RESIDX = #{resIdx} ORDER BY r.REVIEWDATE DESC
SELECT u.USERIDX, r.RESNAME, r.REVIEWCONTENT, r.REVIEWEDATE FROM REVIEW r JOIN USER u ON r.USERIDX = u.USERIDX WHERE r.USERIDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY r.REVIEWDATE DESC
SELECT REVIEWIDX FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEWIDX DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT USERNAME FROM USER WHERE USERIDX = #{userIdx}
